content.question: The display of the sika dwa kofi (Golden Stool) serves to

choices.label: remind young initiates of the object’s fragility during processions
attribute the kingdom’s prosperity to transatlantic trade
reinforce the object’s significance and restricted use
distinguish the object from earlier versions

content.answer: reinforce the object’s significance and restricted use

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
